com.cloudgarden.speech.userinterface
Class RecognizerPropertyPanel

java.lang.Object

                          +--com.cloudgarden.speech.userinterface.RecognizerPropertyPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class RecognizerPropertyPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel

A JPanel used to set Recognizer properties, add/remove words from the Recognizer's VocabManager, test dictation and a minimal set of commands, and display the native interfaces for the Recognizer

See Also:
Serialized Form
